inclusion.criterion: Quantitative assessment of HCV load in the serum by real-time Quantitative PCR
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Genotyping for HCV using INNO-LiPA II
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: chronic active HCV proved by the positivity of HCV RNA, elevated transaminases
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: CTP score was >9, MELD score was <29
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: other causes of liver diseases or mixed causes (excessive alcohol consumption, autoimmune liver disease)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on combination therapy with IFN and RBV. He has a history of inguinal hernia surgery but no other significant medical history.
